summary: The video features a man claiming to be a former SS colonel who worked with the OSS during World War II. He recounts his role in the operation that led to the deaths of Hitler and Goebbels. He demands full citizenship, military pension, Congressional Medal of Honor, and property on Nantucket Island as rewards for his contributions. The speaker is confident and assertive.
keywords: SS, OSS, Hitler, Goebbels, citizenship, pension, Medal of Honor, Nantucket Island
